name: Tibet
startIntroPart2: Thubten Gyatso, leader of Tibet, can you help bring back its greatness? Will your time in charge make Tibet shine again?
declaringWar: Tibet won't let anyone push us around anymore. Get ready, because if you stand in our way, we'll make sure you regret it.
attacked: If you invade Tibet, expect a fight. We won't back down.
defeated: Even in defeat, Tibet's spirit cannot be extinguished. We will rebuild, reclaiming our strength and dignity. Our story is far from over.
introduction: Salutations, esteemed guests, and welcome to Tibet. I am Thubten Gyatso, your host in this land of timeless wisdom and peace.
neutralNo: Sorry but this deal is not of our Interess.
Sorry, but we need to deny your offer.
neutralYes: Great Idea! We accept your offer.
Sure! This deal is exactly what we were needing!
Okay, we shall accept your deal.
hateHello: Your disgrace to Budha, what do you want now?
hateLetsHearIt: Go on! I don't have all the time in the world!
hateNo: Why did I waste my great time on this?
I knew that coming from you It would be a horrible deal.
Go away and never come back!
hateYes: I mean, I guess that's not so much of a bad deal.
Even though I don't like you, you have satisfied Budgha. Thus I accept your deal;
afterPeace: You have made the right decision, May Budha be with you.
tradeRequest: Greetings, we are sending you this great deal, may peace be with you.
unique: Gain enough Faith for a Pantheon
